Name: team_size_minimum
Description: The team size must be at least 3 members

Name: worker_availability_limit
Description: An individual worker's availability must be at least 50%

Name: feature_priority_high
Description: Critical features must have a 'high' priority

Name: blocker_severity_critical
Description: No blocker should have a 'critical' severity

Name: sprint_status_closed
Description: Only consider sprints with status 'closed' for velocity

Name: story_points_positive
Description: Story points for a user story must be a positive integer

Name: task_effort_max
Description: The effort for a single task cannot exceed 40 hours

Name: stakeholder_influence_high
Description: Key features require a stakeholder with 'high' influence

Name: sprint_goal_defined
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal
